statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND sensor_location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_value > 30.0;
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_location = 'Room A'
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND location = 'Lab A';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND value < 50;
DELETE FROM Dashboard WHERE dashboard_name = 'Main Dashboard';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A');
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_status = TRUE);
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Office A' AND status = 'active';
